hints.content:
We need to know the total number of kilograms of aluminum and paper.

![A tape diagram models that the 134 kilograms of aluminum and 277 kilograms of paper are equal to an unknown total number of kilograms.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/bb55bebef09a7db8e4ea8fad4575160f25d53f57)

$\maroonD{134}+\blueE{277} = \purpleD{?}$

$\begin{align}
\maroonD{134}+\blueE{277} &=\maroonD{100}+\blueE{200} + \maroonD{30} + \blueE{70} + \maroonD{4} + \blueE{7} \\\\
&= 300 + 100 +11
\\\\
&=\purpleD{411}
\end{align}$

![Place value blocks show 1 hundred plus 2 hundreds plus 3 tens plus 7 tens plus 4 plus 7](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/697c1b6cac8b7d5073b3c221c564edbbea41acb4)
Aya recycled $\purpleD{411}$ kilograms of aluminum and paper.

question.content:
The table gives the amounts of materials Aya  recycled.

Material | Kilograms
:- | -:
Aluminum | $134$
Plastic | $85$
Glass | $57$
Paper | $277$

**How many kilograms of paper and aluminum did Aya recycle?**

[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] kilograms
